lead_paragraph: Ross Barkley scored a sublime goal as Everton beat Queens Park Rangers 3-1 at Goodison Park on Monday to subject the travel-weary Londoners to their eighth away defeat in as many Premier League matches this season.

headline.main: Everton Play Barkley Card to Trump Struggling QPR
headline.print_headline: Everton Play Barkley Card to Trump Struggling QPR

snippet: Ross Barkley scored a sublime goal as Everton beat Queens Park Rangers 3-1 at Goodison Park on Monday to subject the travel-weary Londoners to their eighth away defeat in as many Premier League matches this season....
